amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 115-39 to direct the Department of Veterans Affairs to develop and implement a plan to hire a director for each VA medical center without a permanent director.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Bost.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
